name: Tutima Academy of Aviation Safety
about: The Tutima Academy of Aviation Safety, founded in 2006 in partnership with aerobatic legend Sean D. Tucker, is a premier global school for precision flight training located in King City, California. Situated on the Pacific coast, the academy benefits from ideal weather conditions and its own reserved airspace for training. The academy offers a comprehensive range of programs, including aviation safety training, aeronautical perfection, and advanced aerobatic maneuvers. With world-class instructors, the academy provides upset awareness and recovery training, pilot confidence training, and custom flight programs tailored to individual needs. From beginner pilots to professionals, including airline and military pilots, the Tutima Academy is dedicated to refining techniques and providing an unparalleled aviation experience.
